document_data.name: House of Winds
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Winds''' was a temple of [[Talos]] in [[Westgate]].{{Cite digital book/Eye of Justice|637}}
document_data.Structure: The temple was noted for the carved [[dragon]]s on its roof.
document_data.Location: The temple was found in the far northeast section of the city on [[Eastgate Street]], near the [[East Gate (Westgate)|East Gate]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The temple was run by Stormlord [[Elort Rhomsivin]]. Elort was assisted by three other priests and four followers.
